item.description:
Dear Java Enthusiasts,
I wanted to throw out a little agenda for our April Meetup:

- Welcome more than a dozen new members
- Welcome back Marina our permanent organizer
- Discuss interest in Andrew's design pattern study group
http://java.meetup.co...
- Discuss Meetup's change to charging a group fee.
http://www.meetup.com...

I look forward to a lively meeting with lots of new members and lots of interest.

Kind regards
You humble interims organizer
Kaj
item.name: The Boston Java April Meetup
